Name: Game of Thrones - A naturalistic viewing dataset
HowToAcknowledge: Noad, K., Watson, D.M., Andrews, T.J. (In review). Natural viewing reveals an extended network of regions for familiar faces that is disrupted in developmental prosopagnosia.
EthicsApprovals: This study was approved by the ethics committee of the York Neuroimaging Centre (University of York, York, UK).
